unnormalised: **Home Loan Schemes Offer Sweet Deals This Festive Season!**
normalised: **Home Loan Schemes Offer Sweet Deals This Festive Season!**

unnormalised: Diwali is just around the corner, and banks are showering us with home loan offers! Forget bursting crackers, burst open your dream home!
normalised: Diwali is just around the corner, and banks are showering us with home loan offers! Forget bursting crackers, burst open your dream home!

unnormalised: HDFC, ICICI, and even our local cooperative banks like the Saraswat Bank are all in the game, folks. Interest rates are dipping like crazy, some as low as 8.5% until 31/12/2023.
normalised: H D F C, I C I C I, and even our local cooperative banks like the Saraswat Bank are all in the game, folks. Interest rates are dipping like crazy, some as low as eight point five percent until thirty first december two thousand and twenty three.

unnormalised: Heard rumours that SBI is waiving processing fees if you apply before 17:00 hrs on 20/10/2023. That's a potential saving of Rs. 10,000 right there!
normalised: Heard rumours that S B I is waiving processing fees if you apply before seventeen hundred hours on twentieth october two thousand and twenty three. That's a potential saving of rupee ten thousand right there!

unnormalised: Plus, several builders in Mumbai and Pune are teaming up with lenders to offer pre-approved loans. Imagine, booking your flat at Lodha Amara in Thane with instant loan approval!
normalised: Plus, several builders in Mumbai and Pune are teaming up with lenders to offer pre-approved loans. Imagine, booking your flat at Lodha Amara in Thane with instant loan approval!

unnormalised: Remember Sharmaji down the street? He snagged a fantastic deal with a PMAY subsidy last year. Still grinning about it!
normalised: Remember Sharmaji down the street? He snagged a fantastic deal with a P M A Y subsidy last year. Still grinning about it!

unnormalised: Don't delay! Get your CIBIL score checked and documents ready. This festive bonanza won't last forever. Time is ticking, people! Maybe 09:00 hrs tomorrow is the time to call up your bank!
normalised: Don't delay! Get your C I B I L score checked and documents ready. This festive bonanza won't last forever. Time is ticking, people! Maybe nine hundred hours tomorrow is the time to call up your bank!

unnormalised: Happy house hunting, and shubh Diwali in advance!
normalised: Happy house hunting, and shubh Diwali in advance!
